/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of the city's towering structures. The buildings, painted in hues of blue and yellow, line the street, their vibrant colors contrasting with the overcast sky. Cars and buses traverse the road, adding to the dynamic nature of the scene. Overhead, power lines crisscross, a common sight in urban landscapes. In the distance, a train station can be seen, hinting at the city's extensive public transportation network. The image is bathed in the soft light of day, highlighting the everyday life unfolding on this busy street in Beijing.
